Secure ostomy bag.sentence: The nurse cleans the patient's skin around the stoma with antiseptic wipes.
Secure ostomy bag.subject: The nurse
Secure ostomy bag.object: the patient's skin around the stoma

Secure ostomy bag.sentence: The nurse measures the stoma to ensure proper fitting of the ostomy bag.
Secure ostomy bag.subject: The nurse

Secure ostomy bag.sentence: The nurse selects an appropriately sized ostomy bag for the patient.
Secure ostomy bag.subject: The nurse

Secure ostomy bag.sentence: The nurse applies the adhesive side of the ostomy bag to the patient's skin around the stoma.
Secure ostomy bag.subject: The nurse
Secure ostomy bag.object: the adhesive side of the ostomy bag

Secure ostomy bag.sentence: The nurse checks the fit of the ostomy bag to ensure it is secure and leak-proof.
Secure ostomy bag.subject: The nurse
Secure ostomy bag.object: the fit of the ostomy bag
